def_cn: 恺撒色拉(食材包括莴苣、鸡蛋、奶酪、炸面包屑,佐以食油、醋和香料)
def_en: Caesar salad is a type of salad containing lettuce, eggs, cheese, and small pieces of fried bread, served with a dressing of oil, vinegar, and herbs.
